articles.title: Nothing Phone 2a Plus vs OnePlus Nord 4: Which smartphone to buy under Rs. 30000 - HT Tech
articles.description: Nothing Phone 2a Plus vs OnePlus Nord 4: Know which latest smartphone to buy under Rs.30000. Check out the in-depth specs comparison between Nothing Phone 2a Plus and OnePlus Nord 4.
articles.content: Nothing Phone 2a Plus vs OnePlus Nord 4: The UK-based smartphone brand, Nothing launched a new smartphone on July 31 called the Phone 2a Plus. It is the upgraded version of Phone 2a, however, the des… [+3003 chars]
